faqSet.name: Can I place a takeout or delivery order from Sopris?
faqSet.desc: Absolutely! Give us a call at 775-755-9005 to place your order.

faqSet.name: What cuisines does Sopris offer?
faqSet.desc: Sopris proudly serves a diverse menu featuring both Mexican and American dishes, providing a range of options for our guests

faqSet.name: What payment methods does Sopris accept?
faqSet.desc: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and cash for payment.

faqSet.name: Does Sopris offer vegetarian or vegan options?
faqSet.desc: Unfortunately we don't currently have vegetarian or vegan options. Send us a message below with suggestions of what you would like to see on the menu

faqSet.name: What are the operating hours of Sopris?
Do I need to make a reservation?
faqSet.desc: No reservation needed! Stop by, take a seat, and we'll take your order.
